rukus.text: Wa Man Ya`shu `An Dhikri Ar-Rahmani Nuqayyiđ Lahu Shaytanaan Fahuwa Lahu Qarinun
Wa 'Innahum Layasuddunahum `Ani As-Sabili Wa Yahsabuna 'Annahum Muhtaduna
Hatta 'Idha Ja'ana Qala Ya Layta Bayni Wa Baynaka Bu`da Al-Mashriqayni Fabi'sa Al-Qarinu
Wa Lan Yanfa`akumu Al-Yawma 'Idh Zalamtum 'Annakum Fi Al-`Adhabi Mushtarikuna
Afa'anta Tusmi`u As-Summa 'Aw Tahdi Al-`Umya Wa Man Kana Fi Đalalin Mubinin
Fa'imma Nadh/habanna Bika Fa'inna Minhum Muntaqimuna
Aw Nuriyannaka Al-Ladhi Wa`adnahum Fa'inna `Alayhim Muqtadiruna
Wa 'Innahu Ladhikrun Laka Wa Liqawmika Wa Sawfa Tus'aluna
Wa As'al Man 'Arsalna Min Qablika Min Rusulina 'Aja`alna Min Duni Ar-Rahmani 'Alihatan Yu`baduna
